1.Description:
You walk into the ruins and it somewhat feels familiar to you at the time, however you are more drawn to the blue flaming portal in the center of the ruins which must have been opened by someone,
but to your knowlage all portals are blue not red, you start to wonder what makes this Portal different

2.Description:
As you walk around the imperial city of Liham,
Liham was named so because of the ancient hero who defeated the demon king 100,000 years ago in the center of the city,
you come across a market place

Attributes.description: you can see the woman is worried about something
Attributes.name: mary
questions: Yes I am fine.... I'm just Worried about my sister Rosa thats all she left almost a year ago and she hasnt responded to any of my letters

3.Description:
You find yourself at the south exit of the city of Liham
as you walk you find a small house that has a woman inside and 
You find there are an Absurd amount of Cats

Attributes.description: you look into the eyes of the woman and see something almost chaotic.....
Attributes.name: Denise
questions: I am Denise I live here with my husband who is getting some food from the market in the city. and... and my cats
Why do you have so many cats?
If i dont take them in Nobody will I have witnissed this fist hand in the city the people there despise cats for some reason, thats why i live all the way out here

4.Description: You find your self in a large open feild walking down a trail beside a river

5.Description: You Find yourself in the city of Cribus Named for it's great invention of a Cribus a specialised gunpowder used for Spacial Cannons The city is bustling with life and you soon descover the shopping district

Attributes.description: Jhohanus is a Store owner that seems to be friendly enough to let you browse his inventory of items
Attributes.name: Jhohanus
questions: I am Jhohanus a Successful entriponure (I made that word up, but it sounds pretty cool doesn't it)
I do lots of things like juggling and all sorts but mainly I am the man everyone comes to for anything they need so you need anything?

6.Description:
You find yourself in a room that is seemingly chock full of xp orbs and Health Potions you feel overcome with you...... until you realise what the man said 'in this area monsters don't die they just come back when you leave the room'
then the horror builds its way back as you realise you have to go through the entire area to get back....

7.Description: you enter a room that has a large pillar in the center with a glowing orb in the center

8.Description: You walk into the room and see that there is a large rune in the center of the room on both the ceiling and floor

9.Description: as you wander you find yourself looking into a camp of bandits, suddenly it seems as if they have spotted you

10.Description: You find yourself wandeing by the East entrance to a large city

11.Description: you find yourself wandering through the feild on a dirt track seeing people pass you going towards the city of Liham or other neighbouring cities

12.Description:
You enter the city of Pluifield a city which once was a farming village but grew due to the enonomy demanding more resources and to the day you can still find signs of the decay that the demon king who ruled the land before he was banished to another world
 you quickly find a market and find that there is nothing for sale as everyone seems to be packing up to leave

13.Description: you find your self traveling for hours and decide to stop in the middle of the feild for a rest

14.Description: You find yourself entering a large open room that seems to be compleately empty nothing in sight............... almost too much nothing

15.Description:
You find yourself in the middle of a room standing in an area that seemingly has no right existing being here seems to feel wrong in all aspects of you body
 you see a young looking man in the corner of the room

Attributes.description: you see a young looking man who seems to becan you over
Attributes.name: Reyan
questions: I am Reyan I was along side Liham when We vanquished the demon lord 100,000 years ago, your thinking how, well nothing ever changes in this realm the demon lord saw to that, by sealing this realm outside of time there are oddities about the area, for example all the monsters that exist to protect this realm will never continue in death, they are mearly dead until you leave the room

he was a brave man who decided to do a foolish thing of Imprisoning the demon lord instead of killing him, the demon lord resides inside of Liham's courpse as Liham must have died by now *[you see the man shed a single tear before the tear shimmeres out of existance]* we imprisoned the demon lord inside of Liham's Soul as a last resort to stop the demon from completing his mission of destroying the world by unleashing his demon hourd on the innocents of this world
I would ask you a favour, find Liham's Body and destroy it so that his soul may be set free and that the demon lord stays in hell for the rest of eternity

16.Description: you find yourself in a small room in which you see a large statue and a depiction of a Spider

17.Description: you find yourself in the center of a cross roads that seems to have an interesting veiw through a mountain cave

18.Description: youfind yourself in a forrest wading through the underbrush of the forrest

19.Description:
As you walk around the imperial city of Liham,
Liham was named so because of the ancient hero who defeated the demon king 100,000 years ago in the center of the city,
you come across a market place

Attributes.description: The man seems to glare at you the entire time
Attributes.name: Joe
questions: Yes I just want you to buy something

20.Description: You Enter The mountain Pass that seems and you suddenly find yourself in the midst of a battle

21.Description: you find yourself in a large open area with a narrow path leading towards the mountain line in the north

22.Description: You find yourself surrounded by guardsman who seem adiment about stealing from you

23.Description: you enter the room only to be greated by more guardians

24.Description: You enter a large open room with nothing inside

25.Description: You enter a large room that has a few guardians lerking in the center of teh room

26.Description: You wander into a forrest and you see something moving up ahead

27.Description: You find yourself in the middle of a clearing in the forrest

28.Description: you find yourself wandeing.... eventually you find that you stumble across a camp

29.Description: You enter the city of Eimling and quickly find the market place

Attributes.description: Jhohanus is a Store owner that seems to be friendly enough to let you browse his inventory of items
Attributes.name: Jhohanus
questions: I am Jhohanus a Successful entriponure (I made that word up, but it sounds pretty cool doesn't it)
I do lots of things like juggling and all sorts but mainly I am the man everyone comes to for anything they need so you need anything?

30.Description: You find yourself at a crossroads with 4 roads and one of these roads leads to a lonly house

31.Description: You enter a large Square Room that seems to have a barriar on the other side of the room

32.Description: You find yourself wandeing into a round room that seems to have a few guardians

33.Description: you find yourself in a corner room with seemingly no guardians

34.Description: you find yourself in the capital city of the Empire Anecaster you easily find yourself in the market place

Attributes.description: Jhohanus is a Store owner that seems to be friendly enough to let you browse his inventory of items
Attributes.name: Jhohanus
questions: I am Jhohanus a Successful entriponure (I made that word up, but it sounds pretty cool doesn't it)
I do lots of things like juggling and all sorts but mainly I am the man everyone comes to for anything they need so you need anything?

Attributes.description: You are lead to the castle and put in front of the King of the Empire
Attributes.name: Augustus
questions: I am king of the empire Augustus

I have a Job for you
 I want you to find our hero Liham and destroy his body as it contains the essance of the demon Lord and destroying it is the only way to bring peace to the lands
Because I say so and I am the king
I shall think about your offer

35.Description: You find yourself in the middle of a small village although all the vilagers seem to look away any time you look directly at them

36.Description: You find yourself in the center of the market in the city of OakMore

Attributes.description: Jhohanus is a Store owner that seems to be friendly enough to let you browse his inventory of items
Attributes.name: Jhohanus
questions: I am Jhohanus a Successful entriponure (I made that word up, but it sounds pretty cool doesn't it)
I do lots of things like juggling and all sorts but mainly I am the man everyone comes to for anything they need so you need anything?

37.Description: on your travels you find that you start to smell salt of some sort

I have a Job for you
 I want you to find our hero Liham and destroy his body as it contains the essance of the demon Lord and destroying it is the only way to bring peace to the lands

39.Description: You Find a small platoon of Soldiers in the area
